The explosion occurred on the sixth floor of the starring judge building in downtown Salt Lake City killed in the blast thirty one year old Steve Christensen a financial consultant left behind his wife Terry and the young family he was lying in the doorway of his office and who's lying on his right side burn marks on his face smoke marks and blood the explosion ripped the door off its hinges and the location of the debris told investigators that the blast occurred directly in front of Steve Christensen's office door you can tell the precise location where the bomb exploded match that with the autopsy and we can tell where the bomb was when it exploded because of the cheering power breaking bones going through skin things of that nature small pieces of batteries and fragments of pipe were found in the whole way as well many

While investigators were sifting through the rubble of the bombings which killed Steve Christensen and Cathy sheets there was a third explosion the very next day this time it happened in a parked car in downtown Salt Lake City the victim was thirty year old mark hi a rare documents unlike the other two victims Hoffman survived the blast off man's injuries were severe the explosion blew off the tips of two fingers a portion of his right knee cap was missing and a piece of metal was embedded in his knees mark Hoffman said that he pulled open the door and the package fell from the seat of the car onto the floorboard of the car at which time it exploded and he was injured mark Hoffman had no connection with the CFS corporation he was a well known and respected rare documents dealer who specialized in early Mormon

When this information was entered into a computer database the gun powder was identified as Hercules bullseye right the same type was used in both bombs since radio shack batteries and electrical components were found at both bomb sites detectives checked all of the radio shack stores in the Salt Lake City area record showed that an individual by the name of Mike Hanson had recently purchased the same components from this radio shack store in Holladay Utah the store had an address from my cancer but it was a vacant lot and detected suspected that the name was an alias the only individual reported seeing anything suspicious at the sheets home was a thirteen year old neighbor Aaron Tapley.

While investigators were sifting through the rubble of the bombings which killed Steve Christensen and Cathy sheets there was a third explosion the very next day this time it happened in a parked car in downtown Salt Lake City the victim was thirty year old mark hi a rare documents unlike the other two victims Hoffman survived the blast off man's injuries were severe the explosion blew off the tips of two fingers a portion of his right knee cap was missing and a piece of metal was embedded in his knees mark Hoffman said that he pulled open the door and the package fell from the seat of the car onto the floorboard of the car at which time it exploded and he was injured mark Hoffman had no connection with the CFS corporation he was a well known and respected rare documents dealer who specialized in early Mormon
